body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Murphy Automotive, my name is Matthew Murphy. May I ask for your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Judy Rogers.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's a pleasure to assist you, Judy. Could you please provide your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, two three four, nine eight seven six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Judy. Can you also confirm your email address for us to reach out to you effectively?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is judy.rogers@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information with me, Judy. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now, thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Judy. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us. Have a wonderful day!
